thread.title: Sasha
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Sasha

author: Sasha
title: Sasha
text: Will at the Hartford location was a great help. He was proficient and professional in finding what was wrong with my vehicle. He even offered an after service check to make sure I felt satisfied with the work done to my car. I appreciated the assistance and genuine customer service.
